title: Who are Khalid ibn al-Walid and Salahuddin Ayyub? What are they famous for in Islamic history? - Quora

He then submitted himself to Islam and saved the Muslims’ army from a deadly defeat by the Romans outnumbering them in Mu’ta battle using his unique military tactics, he also was a spearhead in fighting the defectors (apostates) who defected right after the demise of the prophet. He then toppled the Byzantine empire in a famous battle called Al Yarmook. His cousin was Noor Al Deen Zenki who also fought the Crusaders and raised a generation of Muslim cavalry men to rival and beat those of Europe.
